title: Job and Jeff Talk About Cultivating IRL ConverZations
description:
Job and Jeff talk about the challenges and opportunities of local in person converZations.

Job's first podcast: 
https://hoorbaargeloof.nl/podcast/introductie-met-ds-alexander-veerman/
